nodes.bodyText: Probably just withSpotVirtualMachine, as in doc?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1739,8 +1739,25 @@ WithManagedCreate withNewDataDiskFromImage(int imageLun,
              *
              * @return the next stage of the definition
              */
-            @Beta(Beta.SinceVersion.V1_11_0)
+            @Deprecated
             WithCreate withLowPriorityVirtualMachine(VirtualMachineEvictionPolicyTypes policy);
+
+            /**
+             * Specify that virtual machines in the scale set should be spot priority VMs.
+             *
+             * @return the next stage of the definition
+             */
+            WithCreate withSpotPriorityVirtualMachine();

nodes.bodyText: If so, should we set withSpot() instead of withSpotPriority() in VM?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1739,8 +1739,25 @@ WithManagedCreate withNewDataDiskFromImage(int imageLun,
              *
              * @return the next stage of the definition
              */
-            @Beta(Beta.SinceVersion.V1_11_0)
+            @Deprecated
             WithCreate withLowPriorityVirtualMachine(VirtualMachineEvictionPolicyTypes policy);
+
+            /**

+             *
+             * @return the next stage of the definition
+             */
+            WithCreate withSpotPriorityVirtualMachine();

nodes.bodyText:
OK, withSpot seems not very intuitive as well. Then keep it as withSpotPriorityVirtualMachine.
Keep the PR open for a while to see if there is other opinions.
